Text: RE Projectionsthank you Original Message From Hayslett Rod Sent Wednesday November AM To Desai Jayshree Subject Re Projections Out of office but have people working on info Sent from my BlackBerry Wireless Handheld wwwBlackBerrynet

Projections Cc Hello Rod Can you tell me how much revenue came from Gallup expansion in and Do we have a volumes subscribed and tariff structure for Gallup as we did with Red Rock like page in the presentation Thanks Jayshree

RE Consultants view on gas transmission into CaliforniaPlease let me know what I can do to help Thanks Jayshree Original Message From Hayslett Rod Sent Wednesday November PM To McCarty Danny Harris Steven Donoho Lindy Cc Geaccone Tracy Howard Kevin A Donahue Jeff Taylor Mitch Taylor Sarah Desai Jayshree Subject FW Consultants view on gas transmission into California Importance High I received these comments this afternoon from JPMorgan I need to have some help putting together a story to counteract the basics of this story from CERA Rod Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday November PM To Hayslett Rod Cc Subject Consultants view on gas transmission into California Importance High Rod As we discussed here are the bulletts that summarize what we heard from our consultants Overall demand picture Believe it will be before the California market will get back to demand levels demand down approximately mmcfd demand will be flat growth in demand will begin return to demand levels Reasoning was a dry year the lack of hydro generation created an additional mmcfd demand for gas in California Anticipated generation capacity overbuild in California new more efficient power plants with better heat rates will displace older gas fired generation reducing the amount of gas required to generate a MW of electricity on the margin California electricity rate increases have curtailed demand for power and subsequently gas Gas transmission capacity into the state Over the next two to three years there will be an additional Bcfd of transmission capacity into California mmcfd in mmcfd in Kern River expansion mmcfd El Paso conversion of All American oil line and power up San Juan basin gas San Juan basin production is declining first half of vs first half of production off by approximately mmcfd Rockies gas will not replace declining production in the San Juan San Juan gas will move closer to Permian pricing The consultants believe that the combination of these factors will put decontracting pressure on existing transmission into the state of California and especially the El Paso and Transwestern lines However the wild card in their view is unforeseen California power demand growth As we discussed JPMorgan would like to hear your views on the above issues Please give me a call when you have had sufficient time to digest and we can set up a conference call to make the most efficient use of your time Thanks Rod Brent Also when you have had a chance to look at sales gas volume growth please email the volume numbers to methanks

RE Power and Gas Trading Cc Hello Rakesh and Gwen I am sorry that I have been out of pocket all week and did not have access to my email I have just returned from NY and want to thank you for all of your hard work in helping us track the data You and your team have been extremely responsive in trying to get the information that we need I apologize for making numerous requests but everything that you have provided us will be useful to SSB SSB has been provided with some information They will be incorporating the information that you have provided as well as information from the traders in their board presentations At this stage I believe that we have done all that we can If I hear something further I will let you know on Monday Again thank you very much for all of your help Jayshree Desai Original Message From Bharati Rakesh Sent Fri PM To Taylor Sarah Cc Kaminski Vince J Shanbhogue Vasant Desai Jayshree Donahue Jeff Subject Power and Gas Trading Sarah As I have not yet heard from Jayshree I thought I would convey the gist of our phone conversation by email Over the last several days we in the research group have looked at ORACLE risk management databases and Enrononline data to corroborate the profitability numbers for power and gas trading Our analyses yield figures which are substantially at variance with what is normally believed to be the case Of course there may well be information sources we are not privy to Moreover we found some irregularities in the data which only serve to raise our doubts about the quality of the data As a result we are not able to make an authoritative statement about the profitability of power and gas units As we are not able to intepret the data ourselves we have provided the spreadsheets so you can draw your own conclusions Thanks Rakesh Bharati Phone Fax
FW Bday Cc Lisa Gillette is turning So to celebrate come join us for dinner at Place Backstreet Cafe Address Shepherd Drive Restaurant phone Date Tuesday October Time PM

RE Northern IMwhat is your office location Original Message From Corman Shelley Sent Monday February AM To Desai Jayshree Cc Howard Kevin A Subject RE Northern IM Jayshree give me a call this afternoon at your convenience Ive fact checked the IM and have a couple of questions for you and some language suggestions Original Message From Desai Jayshree Sent Friday February PM To Corman Shelley Cc Howard Kevin A Subject FW Northern IM Sorry that was the wrong draft Here is the latest I am sure that there will be spelling errors but I am more focused on content and will do a really thorough spell check at the end File Northern IMdoc Original Message From Desai Jayshree Sent Friday February PM To Corman Shelley Cc Howard Kevin A Subject Northern IM HI Shelley Attached is a draft of the Northern IM I would greatly appreciate it if you could read it and provide any and all editorial comments I was hoping that you could provide the answers to the questions which Kevin forwarded to you earlier but I also would love someone to take a look at the overall IM and tell me if it is accurate structured well and salesy Kevin said that you were one of the best people to do so given your knowledge of the pipeline Thank you so much for all of your help If you have any questions please feel free to call me anytime today or this weekend Jayshree Desai w H c File Northern IMdoc

RE Northern IMHi Shelley I have a meeting at and am meeting Kevin at Can I come to your office at Original Message From Corman Shelley Sent Monday February AM To Desai Jayshree Cc Howard Kevin A Subject RE Northern IM Jayshree give me a call this afternoon at your convenience Ive fact checked the IM and have a couple of questions for you and some language suggestions Original Message From Desai Jayshree Sent Friday February PM To Corman Shelley Cc Howard Kevin A Subject FW Northern IM Sorry that was the wrong draft Here is the latest I am sure that there will be spelling errors but I am more focused on content and will do a really thorough spell check at the end File Northern IMdoc Original Message From Desai Jayshree Sent Friday February PM To Corman Shelley Cc Howard Kevin A Subject Northern IM HI Shelley Attached is a draft of the Northern IM I would greatly appreciate it if you could read it and provide any and all editorial comments I was hoping that you could provide the answers to the questions which Kevin forwarded to you earlier but I also would love someone to take a look at the overall IM and tell me if it is accurate structured well and salesy Kevin said that you were one of the best people to do so given your knowledge of the pipeline Thank you so much for all of your help If you have any questions please feel free to call me anytime today or this weekend Jayshree Desai w H c File Northern IMdoc

RE Northern IMHi Shelley Here is the latest Original Message From Corman Shelley Sent Thursday February PM To Desai Jayshree Subject RE Northern IM Can you send me the latest version Also I am expecting to shortly have the power plant numbers to add for the market and southend power plant per year based on actual annualized revenues from a recent market power plan Great River and southend PowerTex

RE Final CommentsThanks Shelley I really appreciate all of your help on this Original Message From Corman Shelley Sent Friday February PM To Desai Jayshree Subject Final Comments Jayshree I j found three more minor nits File Northern IMvdoc

RE Final CommentsOne question on the margin per additional power plant that we are assuming for growth is there any capex associated with that growth What about any increase in OM expense Thanks Jayshree Original Message From Corman Shelley Sent Friday February PM To Desai Jayshree Subject Final Comments Jayshree I j found three more minor nits File Northern IMvdoc
